fruits.name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
fruits.description: A rubber fruit that grants the user rubber-like properties.

fruits.name: Mera Mera no Mi
fruits.description: A fire fruit that allows the user to control fire.

fruits.name: Hie Hie no Mi
fruits.description: A fruit that grants the user the ability to create and control ice.

fruits.name: Suna Suna no Mi
fruits.description: A fruit that allows the user to control sand.

fruits.name: Yami Yami no Mi
fruits.description: A fruit that grants the user the ability to control darkness.
